title: The Line of Least Resistance - state of mind

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Wharton uses literary elements and techniques to convey a complex representation of Mr. Mindon’s state of mind.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Wharton uses literary elements and techniques to convey a complex representation of Mr. Mindon’s state of mind.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
